abstract.p: Correction of Oct 19 (2006) article about collapse of actor Richard Easton during performance of The Coast of Utopia; his final line quoted; Martha Plimpton was also onstage

block.p: An article on Oct. 19 about the collapse of the actor Richard Easton during a performance of ''The Coast of Utopia'' at Lincoln Center misidentified his final line before he collapsed, and also misidentified an actor onstage at the time. The line was ''That is my last word,'' not ''You can't go to Berlin!'' One of the actors onstage was Martha Plimpton, not Amy Irving. The errors were discovered last week during the editing of an article about distractions actors encounter during performances.
